feed.title: Current Watches, Warnings and Advisories for New Zealand issued by MetService

entry.title: Road Snowfall Warning
entry.summary: Snow showers are expected above 700 metres today. 1 cm may accumulate about the summit at times.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Road Snowfall Warning
entry.summary: Snow showers are expected to affect the road above 800 metres today. 2 to 5 cm may accumulate about the summit and lesser amounts further down.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Road Snowfall Warning
entry.summary: Snow showers are affecting the road this evening, where 1 to 2 cm of snow may accumulate about the tunnel.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Strong Wind Watch
entry.summary: West to southwest winds may approach severe gale in exposed places. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Strong Wind Watch
entry.summary: Westerly winds may approach severe gale in exposed places. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate. Changes: There is now a Strong Wind Watch in force for the Tararua District and Central Hawkes Bay through to Sunday morning.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Strong Wind Watch
entry.summary: West to southwest winds may approach severe gale in exposed places. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Low. Changes: Chance of upgrade changed to low.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Strong Wind Watch
entry.summary: Southwest winds may approach severe gale in exposed places. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited
